languages.text: "М-м-м... Моим собратьям несвойственна столь слепая тяга к самоубийству. Скорее их ведет отчаяние. После наших интересных похождений в шпиле Опустошительной бури многие из кабала должны были лишиться всего и устремиться прочь из Комморры, пока старые враги не добрались до них. Как... интересно и перспективно".

traits.locale_text: "М-м-м... Моим собратьям несвойственна столь слепая тяга к самоубийству. Скорее их ведет отчаяние. После наших интересных похождений в шпиле Опустошительной бури многие из кабала должны были лишиться всего и устремиться прочь из Комморры, пока старые враги не добрались до них. Как... интересно и перспективно".
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Hmm... My kin are not so blindly suicidal. Desperation is the more likely cause. In the wake of our most intriguing adventure in the Spire of the Reaving Tempest, many Kabal members must have lost everything and fled Commorragh before their old enemies caught up with them. How very... interesting and promising."
languages.original_text: "М-м-м... Моим собратьям несвойственна столь слепая тяга к самоубийству. Скорее их ведет отчаяние. После наших интересных похождений в шпиле Опустошительной бури многие из кабала должны были лишиться всего и устремиться прочь из Комморры, пока старые враги не добрались до них. Как... интересно и перспективно".

traits.locale_text: "Hmm... Such blind, suicidal abandon is uncharacteristic of my kinspeople. They were more likely driven by desperation. In the wake of our most interesting adventure in the Spire of the Reaving Tempest, many Kabal members must have lost everything and fled Commorragh before their old enemies caught up to them. How very... interesting and promising."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Hmm... My kin are not so blindly suicidal. Desperation is the more likely cause. In the wake of our most intriguing adventure in the Spire of the Reaving Tempest, many Kabal members must have lost everything and fled Commorragh before their old enemies caught up with them. How very... interesting and promising."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Hum... Mis congéneres no son tan suicidas. La desesperación es una causa más probable. Después de nuestra interesante aventura en la torre de la Tempestad Asoladora, muchos miembros de la Kábala deben de haberlo perdido todo y habrán huido de Commorragh antes de que sus viejos enemigos les alcanzaran. Qué interesante... y prometedor».
languages.original_text: "Hmm... My kin are not so blindly suicidal. Desperation is the more likely cause. In the wake of our most intriguing adventure in the Spire of the Reaving Tempest, many Kabal members must have lost everything and fled Commorragh before their old enemies caught up with them. How very... interesting and promising."

traits.locale_text: «Hum... Mis congéneres no son tan suicidas. La desesperación es una causa más probable. Después de nuestra interesante aventura en la torre de la Tempestad Asoladora, muchos miembros de la Kábala deben de haberlo perdido todo y habrán huido de Commorragh antes de que sus viejos enemigos les alcanzaran. Qué interesante... y prometedor».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “嗯……我的族人绝不会毫无缘由地发起自杀式袭击，我认为他们更有可能是走投无路才这么做的。在我们那场有趣至极的狂风尖塔冒险之后，肯定有很多阴谋团成员失去了一切。于是他们赶在被宿敌杀上门之前，抢先逃出了科摩罗。这样的行为真是……有趣，而且充满了机遇。”
languages.original_text: "Hmm... My kin are not so blindly suicidal. Desperation is the more likely cause. In the wake of our most intriguing adventure in the Spire of the Reaving Tempest, many Kabal members must have lost everything and fled Commorragh before their old enemies caught up with them. How very... interesting and promising."

traits.locale_text: “嗯……我的族人绝不会毫无缘由地发起自杀式袭击，我认为他们更有可能是走投无路才这么做的。在我们那场有趣至极的狂风尖塔冒险之后，肯定有很多阴谋团成员失去了一切。于是他们赶在被宿敌杀上门之前，抢先逃出了科摩罗。这样的行为真是……有趣，而且充满了机遇。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Hmm... Mes semblables ne sont pas suicidaires à ce point, c'est certainement par désespoir qu'ils agissent ainsi. Suite à notre aventure étrange dans la tour de la Tempête ravageuse, de nombreux membres de la Kabale doivent avoir tout perdu et fui Commorragh avant de se faire rattraper par leurs anciens ennemis. Voilà qui est... intéressant et prometteur à la fois. »
languages.original_text: "Hmm... My kin are not so blindly suicidal. Desperation is the more likely cause. In the wake of our most intriguing adventure in the Spire of the Reaving Tempest, many Kabal members must have lost everything and fled Commorragh before their old enemies caught up with them. How very... interesting and promising."

traits.locale_text: « Hmm... Mes semblables ne sont pas suicidaires à ce point, c'est certainement par désespoir qu'ils agissent ainsi. Suite à notre aventure étrange dans la tour de la Tempête ravageuse, de nombreux membres de la Kabale doivent avoir tout perdu et fui Commorragh avant de se faire rattraper par leurs anciens ennemis. Voilà qui est... intéressant et prometteur à la fois. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「ふむ…俺の同胞は、それほど闇雲に生命を投げ出したりはしないものだがな。絶望に落ちた可能性が高い。〈略奪の嵐〉の尖塔での興味深い冒険をきっかけに、多くの陰謀団のメンバーがすべてを失い、旧敵に追いつかれる前にコモラフから逃亡したに違いない。実に…興味深く、有望だ」
languages.original_text: "Hmm... My kin are not so blindly suicidal. Desperation is the more likely cause. In the wake of our most intriguing adventure in the Spire of the Reaving Tempest, many Kabal members must have lost everything and fled Commorragh before their old enemies caught up with them. How very... interesting and promising."

traits.locale_text: 「ふむ…俺の同胞は、それほど闇雲に生命を投げ出したりはしないものだがな。絶望に落ちた可能性が高い。〈略奪の嵐〉の尖塔での興味深い冒険をきっかけに、多くの陰謀団のメンバーがすべてを失い、旧敵に追いつかれる前にコモラフから逃亡したに違いない。実に…興味深く、有望だ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Hmm ... Meine Verwandten sind nicht so blind selbstmordlustig. Verzweiflung ist die wahrscheinlichere Ursache. Nach unserem faszinierenden Abenteuer im Turm des plündernden Sturms haben gewiss viele Mitglieder der Kabale alles verloren und sind aus Commorragh geflohen, bevor ihre alten Feinde sie einholen konnten. Wie ... interessant und vielversprechend."
languages.original_text: "Hmm... My kin are not so blindly suicidal. Desperation is the more likely cause. In the wake of our most intriguing adventure in the Spire of the Reaving Tempest, many Kabal members must have lost everything and fled Commorragh before their old enemies caught up with them. How very... interesting and promising."

traits.locale_text: "Hmm ... Meine Verwandten sind nicht so blind selbstmordlustig. Verzweiflung ist die wahrscheinlichere Ursache. Nach unserem faszinierenden Abenteuer im Turm des plündernden Sturms haben gewiss viele Mitglieder der Kabale alles verloren und sind aus Commorragh geflohen, bevor ihre alten Feinde sie einholen konnten. Wie ... interessant und vielversprechend."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Türüm hiç de intihara meyilli değildir. Muhtemelen çaresizlikten böyle yaptılar. Müfteris Kasırga Kulesi'ndeki en ilginç maceramızın ardından birçok Kabal mensubu, her şeylerini kaybetmiş ve eski düşmanlarına yakalanmadan Commorragh'tan kaçmış olmalı. Ne kadar da ilginç ve ümit verici."
languages.original_text: "Hmm... My kin are not so blindly suicidal. Desperation is the more likely cause. In the wake of our most intriguing adventure in the Spire of the Reaving Tempest, many Kabal members must have lost everything and fled Commorragh before their old enemies caught up with them. How very... interesting and promising."

traits.locale_text: "Benim soyum aşırı intihara meyilli. Sebebi muhtemelen çaresizliktir. Müfteris Kasırga Kulesi'ndeki en ilginç maceramızın ardından birçok Kabal üyesi her şeylerini kaybetmiş ve eski düşmanlarına yakalanmadan Commorragh'a kaçmış olmalı. Ne kadar da ilginç ve ümit verici."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
